name: BB's Apple Cake
description: A classic apple cake with layers of cinnamon-sugar apples in a dense, rich batter.
ingredients: 4 large apples, pared and sliced thin
instructions: Pare and slice apples thin. Add cinnamon and 1/2 cup sugar to the apples and set aside.
Dump dry ingredients (flour, 2 1/4 cups sugar, baking powder, salt) into a large mixing bowl.
Add liquid ingredients (eggs, oil, orange juice, vanilla). Beat until smooth. Batter will be thick and heavy.
Grease and flour a bundt pan.
Alternate layers of batter and apples in the pan, starting and ending with batter.
Bake at 350Â°F for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until done (generally it takes longer - check with a toothpick).
